## Open Payments

```{r}
open <- providertwo::load_openpayments()

open <- collapse::rsplit(open, ~ theme, keep.by = TRUE)
```


```{r}
open_summary_all <- collapse::sbt(open$Summary, year == "All")

open_summary_all
```


```{r}
open_summary_years <- collapse::sbt(open$Summary, year != "All")

open_summary_years
```


```{r}
open_research <- collapse::mtt(open$`Research Payments`, year = as.integer(year))

open_research
```


```{r}
open_general <- collapse::mtt(open$`General Payments`, year = as.integer(year))

open_general
```


```{r}
open_ownership <- collapse::mtt(open$`Ownership Payments`, year = as.integer(year))

open_ownership
```

## Provider Data

```{r}
prov <- providertwo::load_provider() |> collapse::colorder(theme, title)

prov <- collapse::rsplit(prov, ~ theme, keep.by = TRUE)
```


```{r}
dialysis_facilities <- prov$`Dialysis facilities`

dialysis_facilities
```


```{r}
doctors_and_clinicians <- prov$`Doctors and clinicians`

doctors_and_clinicians
```

pub <- providertwo::load_public()

pub
